data.expected_result: It should stay as bottom we left
data.short_description: Switching orientation while request data page is open, it scrolls all the way up in the background
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user settings -> Privacy settings - Go to the bottom and find Request Data - When you click it, It would give one more confirmation and will say that it can take up to 30 days etc . - Switch orientation - Observe that it has been scrolled up to top.
